original_text: In each town, when you go into a house, first say to the people who live there, “We pray that all will be well with you!”
korean_text: 어느 집에 들어가든지 먼저 말하되 이 집이 평안할지어다 하라

sentences.original_text: when you go into a house
first say to the people who live there
We pray that all will be well with you
